lead_paragraph: A tourist from Florida died Tuesday while hiking during a heat wave in Israel on a trail to the ancient Jewish fortress of Masada.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: Florida Woman Dies Hiking

snippet: A tourist from Florida died Tuesday while hiking during a heat wave in Israel on a trail to the ancient Jewish fortress of Masada.
abstract: Tourist from Florida, young woman whose name has not been released, dies hiking in Israel during heat wave.
